definition: to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot

sentences.english: Drying room to be provided with an ironing board.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥間要提供一個燙衣板。

sentences.english: This table is convertible into an ironing board.
sentences.chinese: 這個桌子是可轉變的，而成燙衣板。

sentences.english: The ironing board was scorched badly.
sentences.chinese: 燙衣板燒焦得非常嚴重。

sentences.english: Then button it up carefully and lay it with the front side down on the ironing board .
sentences.chinese: 然後扣好襯衫，並且將襯衫的前部面對燙衣板放置好。

sentences.english: I need to buy a new ironing board cover.
sentences.chinese: 我需要新買個燙衣板罩。

sentences.english: The iron and ironing board was just down the hall, easily accessible.
sentences.chinese: 電熨斗和燙衣板都靠牆，很容易拿到。

sentences.english: Be sure to fold up the ironing board when you're finished with it.
sentences.chinese: 你用完後一定要把燙衣板折起來。

sentences.english: Then let it rest ove rn ight on the ironing board before moving it.
sentences.chinese: 然後讓它在一夜之間燙衣板，然後再進入它休息。
